description:
If you haven't got a corduroy button down in your shirt quiver yet, you're missing out. But don't worry, because you can start with the best. The wide wale cord on the prAna Ridgecrest Long Sleeve gives it a classic and easy look that works well on its own or layered over your favorite tee.

What's more, this easy-going shirt for him is made from 100% organic cotton, which makes it a winner in our book, no matter which way you wear it.
name: Prana Ridgecrest LS - Mens
